name: Googlemusicmanager.net
tagline: C# implementation of google music manager api
body:
###About
This repository contains C# source to enable uploading and downloading of tracks to Google Music. The GoogleMusicManagerAPI is the main assembly, and GoogleMusicManagerCLI and GoogleMusicDownloaderCLI are example command line interfaces showing how to upload and download.

###Usage
    GoogleMusicManagerCLI 1.0.0.0
    Copyright Â©  2014
      -p, --path         Required. Path to scan.
      -r, --recurse      (Default: True) Recurse directories.
      -o, --oauthfile    (Default: oauth2.json) Oauth2 credentials file.
      --help             Display this help screen.

###Authors and Contributors
Thanks and credit to @SimonWeber for his original python implementation.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
